text: Per Axel Ahlmark (15 January 1939 â€“ 8 June 2018) was a Swedish politician and writer. He was the leader of the Liberal People's Party from 1975 to 1978. He was Minister for Employment and Deputy Prime Minister from 1976 to 1978. He was also a member of the Swedish parliament from 1967 to 1978. Ahlmark died on 8 June 2018 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Stockholm Category:Writers from Stockholm
title: Per Ahlmark
